title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, moving the scrollbars does not result in any changes. This behavior is misleading, especially when viewing small images such as icons.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe the enabled scrollbars.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars.
4. Notice that the scrollbars do not have any effect.
